auth.profileLinkedSuccess: Your account has been linked to your existing player profile and tournament history!
auth.passwordRequirements: Must be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, and number

rankings.title: Category Rankings
rankings.subtitle: View player rankings across tournament categories

publicRankings.title: Player Rankings
publicRankings.subtitle: View all registered players
publicRankings.comingSoon: Tournament brackets and results will appear here

createUser.title: Create New User
createUser.roleHelp: Admins can manage users and system settings. Organizers can create tournaments.

ruleChangeWarning.title: Confirm Rule Change
ruleChangeWarning.formatNotAllowedMsg: Tournament format cannot be changed after matches have started or been completed. This tournament has {completed} completed match(es) and {inProgress} in-progress match(es).
ruleChangeWarning.ruleChangeMsg: You are about to change the {changeType} for this tournament. Since no matches have been played yet, this change will affect all matches.
ruleChangeWarning.activeTournamentMsg: This tournament has already started. Changing {changeType} will:
ruleChangeWarning.notAffectCompleted: NOT affect completed matches ({count} match{plural}) - they retain their original rules
ruleChangeWarning.notAffectInProgress: NOT affect in-progress matches ({count} match{plural}) - they keep their current rules
ruleChangeWarning.applyToFuture: Apply to future matches ({count} match{plural}) - they will use the new rules
ruleChangeWarning.cannotProceed: Cannot proceed: Format changes are not allowed after matches have started.

createPlayer.title: Create New Player Profile
createPlayer.duplicateNote: You can still create this profile if you're sure it's a different person. Please verify the name and contact information to avoid duplicate entries.
createPlayer.emailHint: Optional. Used for linking player accounts later.

alerts.selectCategory: Select a category to view rankings
alerts.selectPlayer: Please select a player to view available categories
alerts.noCategoriesFound: No categories found. Create your first category to get started.
alerts.noTournamentsFound: No tournaments found. Create your first tournament to get started.

status.registeredDesc: You have a confirmed spot in this tournament
status.waitlistedDesc: Tournament is at capacity. You will be notified if a spot opens up.
status.withdrawnDesc: You have withdrawn from this tournament

placeholders.overrideJustification: Explain why this pair should be allowed despite eligibility violations...

registration.pairsInCategoryHint: Only pairs in the {categoryName} category are shown
registration.allPlayersHint: Showing all players in the system
registration.capacityWarning: Tournament is at capacity. You'll be asked to select who to move to waitlist.

complexity.standardDesc: Rules defined only at tournament level
complexity.modifiedDesc: Rule changes defined at group or round level
complexity.complexDesc: Rule changes configured for specific matches

rules.title: Tournament Rules
rules.scoringDescription: Default scoring rules applied to all matches unless overridden.
rules.standardRules:
This tournament uses standard rules throughout.
No group, round, or match-specific overrides have been configured.
rules.customOverrides: This tournament has custom rule overrides
rules.modifiedDescription: Rule changes have been configured at the group or round level. Different parts of the tournament may use different rules.
rules.specificDescription: Rule changes have been configured for specific matches. Individual matches may use customized rules beyond the standard configuration.
rules.overrideNote: Detailed override information is available through the tournament management interface. Contact the tournament organizer for specific rule variations.

errors.loginFailed: Login failed. Please verify your email and password are correct.
errors.nameMinLength: Player name must be at least 2 characters long
errors.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
errors.passwordLowercase: Password must contain a lowercase letter
errors.passwordUppercase: Password must contain an uppercase letter
errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address (e.g., player@example.com)
errors.phoneDigits: Phone must have 7-15 digits after the + sign
errors.phoneFormat: Phone must be in international format: +CountryCodeNumber (e.g., +12345678901)

help.waitlistExplanation: The waitlist holds players who want to join but can't because the tournament is full. If a registered player withdraws, the first person on the waitlist automatically takes their spot.
help.seedingScoreExplanation: Seeding score is calculated from both players' individual rankings and determines the pair's initial tournament placement.
help.phoneFormat: International format includes country code (e.g., +421 for Slovakia, +1 for USA/Canada). Example: +421901234567
help.rawConfigExplanation: Raw JSON configuration for advanced users and developers. This shows the exact tournament settings as stored in the database.
help.duplicateExplanation: Creating duplicate profiles can lead to incorrect tournament seeding and ranking calculations. Only create a new profile if you're certain this is a different person.
